name: M4 Tank Brigade
description: WWII Tank Simulation game offering offline Single Player and online Multiplayer combat with multiple armored vehicles.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Memory: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 4 GB available space
